The impressive 24,690â€“square-foot complex marks a significant milestone as KCC also celebrates 20 years of service to the community.Dialysis Care Center: Patient-Centric DesignSuite 100, on the first floor, houses the Dialysis Care Center, overseen by Medical Director Dr. Sushant Taksande. The DCC team includes a clinic manager, 2 Staff Nurses, 5 Patient Care Technicians, 1 Administration Assistant, and 1 Biomed Technician.
title: Transforming Dialysis Care: Inside Oak Lawn's State-of-the-Art Facility - Dialysis Care Center
